name: Rumble Town Racing 1
description:
Original Browser Game by Silent Bay Studio

Reviving one of the classic Shockwave.com games. 

Credits to Tomysshadow for the standalone.

Gameplay

The player is supposed to complete four-race challenges every day at midnight.

There are eight game modes such as Fast Lane, Checkpoint, Sudden Death, Burning Wheels, and more. There is a training mode, which lets the player learn how to play.

The player starts with your first car, the Tomahawk, and there are three other cars in this game, which can be purchased by using in-game cash.

The player can customize the cars by visiting the garage. The player can customize the car by adding paint jobs, glass tints, stickers, body kit parts, and accessories.
